channel.title: Testing on Kha's School of Karate
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Kha's School of Karate

item.title: Q4 black belt test
item.description:
Q4 black belt test

The Q4 black belt test will be held Saturday November 9, 2024 10:30 AM

9411 Staple Ln
Atlee, Virginia

Black belt candidates
Stephen Pham
Annikha Nguyen

All students are invited and encouraged to attend and support the testing students. Brown belts and up are invited to wear uniform.
